bookTitle: The Legend of Sleepy Hollow (Graphic Novel)
bookAuthors: Bo Hampton, Tracey Hampton, Washington Irving
Plot: Please note that this is the graphic novel adaptation of Sleepy Hollow . If you're looking for the short story, go here . This is Bo Hampton's 1993 Legend of Sleepy Hollow, a faithful adaptation of Washington Irving's tale surrounding the ghostly inhabitants of Tarrytown, New York around the time of the American Revolution. The cast of characters is headed up by the Headless Horseman himself. This edition boasts new covers and 16 pages of new material, including numerous preliminary sketches of scenes and characters.
Characters: Ichabod Crane, Katrina Van Tassel, Abraham "Brom Bones" Van Brunt, Baltus Van Tassel
Setting: United States of America, Tarrytown, New York (United States), New York State (United States)
